items.name: High-resolution PRISMA methane plumes
items.description: Additional data related to the paper "Mapping methane point emissions with the PRISMA spaceborne imaging spectrometer", Guanter et al. (2021), Remote Sensing of Environment. The archive provides methane plumes detected with PRISMA satellite in four different parts of the world (oil and gas extraction fields in Algeria, Turkmenistan, and the Permian Basin (USA), and coal mines in the Shanxi region in China). The files are provided in NetCDF4-CF format. Please, find additional information about .nc files in the READ_ME file.
items.citationHtml: Guanter, Luis; Irakulis-Loitxate, Itziar, 2021, "High-resolution PRISMA methane plumes", https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/BMNF0H, Harvard Dataverse, V1
